definition: A visit to a professional for a specific purpose related to oral health, typically involving examination, treatment, or consultation.

examples.german: Ich habe einen Zahnarztbesuch nächste Woche.
examples.english: I have a dentist appointment next week.
My dental visit was very pleasant.

examples.german: Ich habe Angst vor dem Zahnarztbesuch.
examples.english: I'm afraid of going to the dentist.

examples.german: Der Zahnarztbesuch dauerte länger als erwartet.
examples.english: The dental visit took longer than expected.
I need to reschedule my dentist appointment.
